content: Do we need $match operation for Practitioner to be used with Service Provider Directory similarly to Patient with MPI?

do you need it?

We are about to migrate Provider Registry to FHIR starting next fiscal, we may need it. (I have not seen all business reqs yet.)

The patient $match operation was defined in such a way that you could apply it to any resource type, so consider that.
You would still need to implement it though...
